tags: this has been in my inbox for weeks- sorry!!
oh oh!! could that be a sneaky preview of deku's symbiote?? one for all!!!
hehe- ive actually finished his design i just need to do some more concept work and he'll be uploaded!
summary: Oh I now imagine... Izuku trying to feed Eri... (symbiotes also need food) and she opens a big, venom-like mouth with teeth and...
question: Oh I now imagine... Izuku trying to feed Eri... (symbiotes also need food) and she opens a big, venom-like mouth with teeth and tongue and Izuku absolutely terrified :D
answer: deku’s pretty used to symbiotes, but he doesnt know what to expect with eri since she- seemingly- doesnt have a mouth. it spooked him a bit!!

blog.name: write-yourself-a-river
blog.title: All These Prompts And I Still Can't Find A Fic
blog.description:
This is a prompt blog. Most of these prompts will be by me and they'll be limited to fandoms I know.

Submissions are acceptable so long as they follow the rules, if not I'll just delete them.

summary: Fandom: Boku no Hero Academia Characters: Shinso Hitoshi Warnings: Violence probably, threats Prompt: Hitoshi knows things. He's...
body:
Fandom: Boku no Hero Academia
Characters: Shinso Hitoshi
Warnings: Violence probably, threats

Prompt: Hitoshi knows things. He’s seen things he shouldn’t have. He’s tripped over secrets, dark ones. It’s just too bad that no one trusts anything he says, because these secrets keep him from ever getting to UA.

- kunnskat on AO3

blog.name: king-of-the-youth
blog.title: w h a t e v e r

tags: bnha moments i think a lot about
summary:
KiriBaku's early interactions.
Kirishima thinking Bakugou was dangerous and completely nuts (I mean  can we blame him?)
To later...
body:
My Hero Academia moments I think A LOT about #2

KiriBaku’s early interactions.

Kirishima thinking Bakugou was dangerous and completely nuts (I mean can we blame him?)

To later seeing him in a new light just to have Bakugou flip him off.

To finally becoming best bros at the Sports Festival.

And the rest is history…

tags: i know it looks like a trainwreck
to be fair thats kinda what i was going for
summary: I was going to wait on posting this but turns out I have no restraint. So here you go: my attempt at the Toshinko soulmark for...
body:
I was going to wait on posting this but turns out I have no restraint. So here you go: my attempt at the Toshinko soulmark for my Soulmate!AU.

Soulmarks are supposed to be abstract, but I couldn’t think of how to do abstract graffiti so instead I overlapped four words, two in English and two in Japanese. Bonus points if you can distinguish them, because even I can’t anymore.

summary: With y’all being nasty with Villain Deku I made a AU where things are less nasty. It’s in the real world and in the future.
body:
With y’all being nasty with Villain Deku I made a AU where things are less nasty. It’s in the real world and in the future.

Deku: At a young age, Deku got in a car accident and after his life was saved by Dr. Toahinori he made his goal in life to be a Surgeon. He met Urakaka in highschool and dated through college. His is a nurse at the moment is working to be promoted. He and Urakaka live together but despite being together for 4 years, they still act awkward around each other.

Bakugo: Same Bakugo only now he’s a fire fighter with anger issues. He and Kirishima share an apartment over a bar because Kirishima is the only person Bakugo can stand to live with

Todoroki: Detective at Endevoar’s Precint and mostly deals with his bigger cases. Hides the fact they’re related, no plans on getting married, and meets with Midoria and Urakaka for brunch every Sunday.

Iida and Momo: Both went into their families’ companies and quickly rose through the ranks without nepotism. Because the companies are in similar fields they’re close contacts and both secretly like each other but feel their careers are too important right now (but still wish they could)

Urakaka: Lives with Deku But went into finance and stocks in order to best help her mom and dad. Also is thinking about children, but not for a few years lol

Kirishima: Also a fire fighter with Bakugo and is CONSTANTLY playing Wingman with him to try and get him a girl

Eijirou and Kaminari: Been dating since highschool and are currently engaged. Eijirou is a freelance musician and Kaminari is an electrical contractor.


PLEASE LEAVE MORE HEADCANNONS FOR THIS
